headline.title: New news! DanWasHere is now powered by the Symfony platform
DanWasHere.com moves to a LAMP server, and is now powered by PHP and MySQL with the interface now in CSS and XHTML.
These links all stay within DanWasHere.com, however, they could also lead off to other websites. For instance, here's google.com.
DanWasHere.com rebranded and rebuilt in CSS2 and HTML4.01, in a stream-lined, tableless design.
UltimaThrust continues to draw gamers keen to beat each other's scores in the dynamic, database powered hi-score table.
